SELECT user_id AS userId, user_name AS name, user_email AS email, user_phone AS phone, user_enter_day AS enterDate, user_status AS userStatus FROM user WHERE 1 = 1
AND TRIM(LOWER(user_name)) = TRIM(LOWER(#{keyword}))
AND TRIM(LOWER(user_email)) = TRIM(LOWER(#{keyword}))
AND REPLACE(TRIM(user_phone), '-', '') = REPLACE(TRIM(#{keyword}), '-', '')
